description:
My place is close to Central Park (2 mins), close to Lincoln Center (5-10 mins), close to train station (123BC - 2 mins) You’ll love my place because of the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Tons of food around!

NOTE!! Since everyone has a smart phone nowadays, why do you even have Wi-Fi at home? Why not go out and enjoy what the city has to offer?
Therefore, this studio doesn't have Wi-Fi. 
That's why it is cheaper. :)

Clean

Whole Studio

Yes, you can call/text me anytime

Close to Central Park (2 mins)
Close to major Train stations (2 mins)
Close to Trader Joe's (Grocery)
Close to Bloomingdales (Outlet Mall)
Close to Lincoln Center (5-10 mins)

Subway: B,C,1,2,3 train
name: Cute Studio near Central Park
review: Demi is awesome and the location and value can't be beat.
